targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)
SELECT count("min") FROM (SELECT min("value") FROM "uptime_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND time > now() - $__interval) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT count("min") FROM (SELECT min("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type_instance" = 'idle' AND time > now() - $__interval) GROUP BY "host","instance" ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT mean("value") FROM "load_longterm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") *-1+100 FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'percent' AND "type_instance" = 'idle') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") *-1+100 FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'percent' AND "type_instance" = 'idle') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'percent' AND "type_instance" = 'inactive') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "disk_read" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$diskname$/ AND "type" = 'disk_octets') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "interface_rx", "interface_tx" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$ifname$/ AND "type" = 'if_packets') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "interface_rx", "interface_tx" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$ifname$/ AND "type" = 'if_packets') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "interface_rx", "interface_tx" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$ifname$/ AND "type" = 'if_packets') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)

list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "uptime_value" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "interface_rx" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Network interface
list.name: ifname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "interface_rx" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname/

list.label: Disk
list.name: diskname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk_read" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "df_value" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Volume
list.name: volname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "df_value" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_value" WITH KEY = "type_instance" WHERE "type" = 'temperature' AND "host" =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Temperature
list.name: temperature
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_value" WITH KEY = "type_instance" WHERE "type" = 'temperature' AND "host" =~ /$hostname/
